sense.def:
To chase someone
pomeni teči za nekom ali ga zasledovati, da bi ga ujeli ali odpodili.

seg.quote: Youngsters chase one another up trees.
A dozen soldiers chased after the car.
They were chased from the village.
They abandoned the chase and returned home.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
chases something
, se zelo trudi, da bi nekaj dobil, na primer delo ali denar.

seg.quote: We are getting more and more applicants chasing fewer and fewer jobs.
